00028    CompositionProfile::CompositionProfile(System& system) 
00029     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00030       isInitialized_(false)
00031    {}
00032 
00033    CompositionProfile::~CompositionProfile() 
00034    {}
00035 
00037    void CompositionProfile::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00038    {
00039 
00040       // Read interval and output file 
00041       readInterval(in);
00042       readOutputFileName(in);
00043 
00044       nAtomType_ = system().simulation().nAtomType();
00045 
00046       // Read number of direction vectors and direction vectors 
00047       read<int>(in, "nDirections", nDirection_);
00048       intVectors_.allocate(nDirection_);
00049       waveVectors_.allocate(nDirection_);
00050       readDArray<IntVector>(in, "intVectors", intVectors_, nDirection_);
00051 
00052       accumulators_.allocate(nDirection_*nAtomType_);
00053 
00054       isInitialized_ = true;
00055    
00056    }
00057 
00058    /*
00059    * Clear accumulators.
00060    */
00061    void CompositionProfile::setup() 
00062    {  
00063       int bin;
00064       double min, max;
00065       
00066       for (int i=0; i < nDirection_; ++i) {
00067          for (int j=0; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00068 
00069             min = 0.0;
00070             max = 1.0;
00071 
00072             // number of bins in histogram = int(((max-min)/0.05));
00073             bin = 500;
00074 
00075             accumulators_[i+j*nDirection_].setParam(min, max, bin);
00076          }
00077       }
00078 
00079       makeWaveVectors();
00080 
00081       // Clear accumulators
00082       for (int i = 0; i < nDirection_; ++i) {
00083          for (int j = 0; j < nAtomType_; ++j){
00084             accumulators_[i+j*nDirection_].clear();
00085          }
00086       } 
00087       nSample_ = 0;
00088    }
00089  
00090    void CompositionProfile::sample(long iStep) 
00091    {
00092       Vector blengths;
00093 
00094       // Lengths of simulation box
00095       blengths = system().boundary().lengths();
00096 
00097       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00098 
00099          Vector  position;
00100          double  product;
00101          System::ConstMoleculeIterator  molIter;
00102          Molecule::ConstAtomIterator  atomIter;
00103          int  nSpecies, iSpecies, typeId;
00104 
00105          // Loop over all atoms
00106          nSpecies = system().simulation().nSpecies();
00107          for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00108             system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00109           
00110             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00111                molIter->begin(atomIter); 
00112           
00113                for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00114                   position = atomIter->position();
00115                   typeId   = atomIter->typeId();
00116                   for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00117                      position[i] /= blengths[i];
00118                   }
00119         // Loop over direction vectors
00120                   for (int i = 0; i < nDirection_; ++i) {
00121                      product = position.dot(waveVectors_[i]);
00122                      product /= waveVectors_[i].abs();
00123                      accumulators_[i+typeId*nDirection_].sample(product);
00124                   }
00125        
00126                }
00127   
00128             }
00129          }
00130 
00131       ++nSample_;
00132 
00133       }
00134 
00135    }
00136 
00140    void CompositionProfile::makeWaveVectors()
00141    {
00142       Vector    dWave;
00143       Boundary* boundaryPtr = &system().boundary();
00144       int       i, j;
00145 
00146       // Calculate wavevectors
00147       for (i = 0; i < nDirection_; ++i) {
00148          waveVectors_[i] = Vector::Zero;
00149          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00150             dWave  = boundaryPtr->reciprocalBasisVector(j);
00151             dWave *= intVectors_[i][j];
00152             waveVectors_[i] += dWave;
00153             //std::cout << waveVectors_[i] << std::endl;
00154          }
00155       }
00156    }
00157 
00158    void CompositionProfile::output() 
00159    {
00160       int i, j, k;
00161       std::string suffix;
00162       
00163       // Echo parameters to a log file
00164       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00165       writeParam(outputFile_);
00166       outputFile_.close();
00167 
00168       // Output statistical analysis to separate data file
00169       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00170       for (i = 0; i < nDirection_; ++i) {
00171          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00172             outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[i][j], 5);
00173          }
00174          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00175       
00176          for (k = 0; k < nAtomType_; ++k) {
00177             accumulators_[i+k*nDirection_].output(outputFile_);
00178             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00179             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00180          }
00181       }
00182       outputFile_.close();
00183 
00184 
00185    }
